extension.summary: Browse and watch Cisco Live on-demand sessions
extension.description: Browse the full Cisco Live on-demand library with 14,000+ technical sessions from 2018-2026. Filter by event, technology, technical level, or search by keyword. Features QR code login via Cisco SSO, watch history tracking, and multi-select filtering. Streams sessions directly via the RainFocus catalog API and Brightcove video platform.
extension.news: v2.0.0 - Initial release with dual-catalog support, multi-select filtering, QR code login, and Wall view.
